bibl.title: Fayoum Portraits and Their Influence on the First Coptic Icons. Translated by Susan HOWE.

Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause

bibl.seg: RUTCHOWSCAYA Marie-Hélène, Fayoum Portraits and Their Influence on the First Coptic Icons. Translated by Susan HOWE.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 247-255, 6 figg.
